org.redpin.android.ui.mapgl
Class MapGLRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.redpin.android.ui.mapgl.MapGLRenderer

public class MapGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

Renderer displaying the map by floors, the markers, and controlling the camera, perspective, etc.

Author:
Benjamin Mesre
